DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if treatment is effective in preventing fractures in women with postmenopausal osteoporosis
DOC.brief_title: Registrational Study With AMG 785 to Treat Postmenopausal Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal women osteoporosis, defined as low bone mineral density Severe osteoporosis Use of agents affecting bone metabolism History of metabolic or bone disease (except osteoporosis) Vitamin D insufficiency (vitamin D repletion and rescreening is permitted) Current hyper or hypocalcemia Current, uncontrolled hyper or hypothyroidism Current, uncontrolled hyper or hypoparathyroidism
DOC.keyword: Osteoporosis, Osteoporosis-Postmenopausal, Bone Diseases-Metabolic, Bone Diseases, Musculoskeletal Diseases
